CustomField.formula:
IF( AND(OR(HWS_SalesOrganisation__c="FI44", HWS_SalesOrganisation__c="US44") , CH_CDB_ContractType__c ="Internal - RFT - Retrofit"), "Global Retrofit",
IF(AND(OR(NOT(HWS_SalesOrganisation__c="FI44"),NOT( HWS_SalesOrganisation__c="US44")) , CH_CDB_ContractType__c ="Internal - RFT - Retrofit"),"Local Retrofit",""))
CustomField.label: Retrofit_Type
